name: Myo-Reps (Autoregulated Mini-Sets)
time_per_session_breakdown: One main activation set + multiple mini-sets (3-5 reps) with ~10s rest
overview_and_execution: Choose a weight for 10-20 reps as an activation set. Go near failure, rest 10s, do a mini-set of 3-5 reps. Continue mini-sets (with 10s rest) until speed or reps drop. Log total reps.
example_application: Chest press machine: 15 reps (activation), rest 10s, 5 reps, rest 10s, 4 reps, rest 10s, 4 reps, final 3 reps. Stop if rep speed slows too much.
important_notes: Good for hypertrophy with minimal volume. Track total reps and aim to improve over sessions. Great on machines or stable exercises.
volume_metrics: 1 extended set can yield 20-30 total reps
